description: Creates a new, empty global network.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description of the global network. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the resource during creation. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetwork
nested_items.description: Information about the global network object.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the global network.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the global network.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the global network was created.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the global network.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags for the global network.
